author: TimONoff
title: Lack of functionality
review:
Dear developers,
Thank you very much for supporting Excel for iPad ‚Äî the number of people who want to replace their laptops with iPad is increasing, and you support this small but fast growing group!
However, it would be great if you can add 2 minor but important things:
1) Editing waterfall charts. Now I cannot set a column as total
2) Mode of calculation. Now I cannot choose between manual and automatic calculation
Kind regards
original_review:
Dear developers,
Thank you very much for supporting Excel for iPad ‚Äî the number of people who want to replace their laptops with iPad is increasing, and you support this small but fast growing group!
However, it would be great if you can add 2 minor but important things:
1) Editing waterfall charts. Now I cannot set a column as total
2) Mode of calculation. Now I cannot choose between manual and automatic calculation
Kind regards

author: pizzastromboli
title: Inconvenient and difficult to understand compared to PC
review:
I am using iPad Pro with a magic keyboard. Simply put, on a PC it's too hard to find out where the right click operations have gone. The official Excel for iPad help is pretty much useless.
The most stressful thing is that I can hit the punctuation marks (.) but not the punctuation marks (.). I found that you can get it by searching for information on the net and converting "option +.", but it's too inconvenient. Science people may have a convention of using "." for horizontal writing, but not everyone. We would like you to use the punctuation marks as soon as possible. Thank you! (Actual)

It would have been much better to try to keep the body of excel so you recognized yourself. Of course, I understand that you have to reduce the scope of the program's original size, but not in this way.
Rolf B Carlsson
